alert.note: Alert for Barbour (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 12:57PM EDT until May 08 at 2:18AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in West Virginia... Tygart Valley River At Philippi affecting Barbour County. For the Tygart Valley River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tygart Valley River At Philippi. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, The intersection of US Route 119 and Truck Route 250 is flooded. Also, Sycamore Street and Beech Avenue are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to rise reaching 19.5 feet this evening. It will fall below flood stage again late this evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.5 feet on 01/29/1957. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM EDT.
